snippet: A drug-resistant superbacteria was discovered in the waters where the sailing events for the 2016 Olympics are set to be held.
abstract: Drug-resistant superbacteria that is notoriously difficult to treat is discovered in the waters where the sailing events for the 2016 Olympics in Rio de Janeiro are set to be held.
lead_paragraph: A drug-resistant superbacteria was discovered in the waters where the sailing events for the 2016 Olympics are set to be held.
